crypto.name: Adventurers Knapsack
DIY enc
crypto.desc:
Medium

I met a strange soul who claimed to have invented a more robust version of AES and dared me to break it. Could you help me?

crypto.name: PiedPic
crypto.desc:
Easy

Dante took many pictures of his journey to the afterlife. They contain many revelations. I'll give you one of these pictures if you'll give me one of yours!

crypto.name: Small Inscription
crypto.desc:
Easy

I came across a strange inscription on the gate that connects two circles, but I cannot read the last part. Can you help me?

pwn.name: Dantes Notebook
pwn.desc:
Medium

During his trip to Hell Dante met many souls. He took notes about them in this diary.

pwn.name: Sentence To Hell
pwn.desc:
Easy

Name a soul you want to send to hell and we'll handle the sentence.

pwn.name: Soulcode
pwn.desc:
Medium

Before you leave the realm of the dead you must leave a message for posterity!

rev.name: Rusty Safe
rev.desc:
Medium

I found this rusty safe in the depths of the hell, but I need a code to (hopefully) open it...

web.name: CryptoMarket
web.desc:
Medium

Some people are coding a website to buy and share crytpos. They are testing with real crypto amounts though. We need to hack them and steal their money!

web.name: SecureHashedDb
web.desc:
Hard

My close friend just made an application for my "Security Project" but I didn't release it because I don't fully trust him... Yeah we're not so close friends... Maybe I need to contact Troy Hunt and ask him how to make a site like HaveIbeenPwned.
